metadata.title: Brian Kariu - Software Engineer
metadata.description: I bridge the gap between application development and big data. As a Full Stack Developer and Data Engineer, I specialize in turning raw information into actionable systems. When I'm not coding or designing a new data flow, you can find me reading up on new concepts or diving into a good video game.

experience.experience: Headed a team of data engineers and spearheaded 3 projects end to end. Developed a semantic layer enabling data commercialization through APIs, boosting revenue by 7%. Architected LLM-driven consultation modules using achieving 40% user adoption for the company products. Designed and deployed 3+ microservices in Django handling 5k reqs/min using Kubernetes. Maintained data pipeline infrastructure with a 99.9% SLA.
Migrated to automated deployments for our tech stack. Created an online learning platform tailored for medical professionals that led to increased revenue for the company.
Conducted comprehensive software testing on various systems

projects.title: django chain
projects.description: A Django library for seamless LangChain integration, making it easy to add LLM capabilities to your Django applications.

projects.title: go ryuk
projects.description: Ryuk is a fast environment management tool for your projects. Manage your application configuration and secrets and sync them to your cloud repositories all in one cli.

projects.title: cookiecutter airflow
projects.description: Cookiecutter Airflow is the fastest way to get started with data orchestration with modern python tooling.

projects.title: kenya headline vault
projects.description: This project aims to scrape the latest data from all kenya news outlets using puppeteer and node.js.
